text: The 1912 Washington State football team was an American football team that represented Washington State College during the 1912 college football season. The team competed as an independent under head coach John R. Bender who returned from a four-year absence, compiling a record of 2–3. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Opponent ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Score ! scope="col" | Attendance |- ! scope="row" | October 18 | Idaho | Home | 0-13 L | 3,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 26 | Oregon | Away | 7-0 W | NA |- ! scope="row" | November 1 | Oregon State | Home | 10-9 W | NA |- ! scope="row" | November 9 | Whitman | S | 0-30 L | NA |- ! scope="row" | November 28 | Washington | Away | 0-19 L | NA |} ==References== Washington State Category:Washington State Cougars football seasons Category:1912 in Washington (state)
title: 1912 Washington State football team
